name: Circuit Breaker Design Pattern
problem: Define threshold algorithm to call function and measure failures through a period of time. Once it reaches the threshold, it falls back to another function, providing a subset of functionalities compared to the default function.
steps: Identify the critical service or component that requires protection.
Implement a circuit breaker that monitors the service's health and failure rates.
Define thresholds for failures within a time window.
Configure fallback logic to activate when the threshold is reached.
Test the circuit breaker for rapid failures and recovery scenarios.
